metadata.dc:author: Loza Arredondo, M C
Hicks, J J
metadata.dc:description: In order that blastocyst implantation occurs in mammals, it is required the synthesis and secretion of several substances including steroid hormones by the preimplanted embryo. In this paper, we analyze the embryo endocrine capacity for biosynthesis and secretion of progesterone and several progestines.
metadata.dc:title: Capacidad endocrina del blastocisto de mamífero. I. Biosíntesis y metabolismo de progesterona.
[Endocrine capacity of blastocysts in mammals. I. Progesterone biosynthesis and metabolism].
